display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI in NREM sleep (>= 0% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or NREM sleep time is 0
calculation: rdimnr0p  = 60*(hnrbp + hnrop + canbp + canop + oanbp +oanop + manrbp + manrop)/(slpprdp - minremp)
